title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy local LLM integration in Python scripts.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers via a lightweight npm package.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM or chat components in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring folder organization, code highlighting, and dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community-built Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight CLI chat client for Ollama written in Node with readline prompts and markdown rendering.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Template repo showing how to build a Chainlit conversational UI backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset enabling Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React, packaged as a portable binary.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama, supports conversation memory and parameter tuning.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, and GPU support with one command.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selectors.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles for community-tuned Llama, Mistral, and CodeLlama variants optimized for Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama users sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing integrations.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Experimental plugin adding in-memory HNSW vector search to Ollama for local RAG without external DBs.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama offering synchronous and async APIs plus a tiny CLI example.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library and CLI for Ollama supporting streaming, JSON options, and dependency injection.
